Description: Germany's Federal Intelligence Service head warns Russia intends to test NATO's collective defense commitment, with threat timeline accelerating if Ukraine war ends before 2029, enabling resource reallocation against Europe.

Title: Ukrainian military operations hampered as US cuts critical intell...
Description: The Trump administration has blocked Ukrainian access to critical satellite intelligence as part of a wider strategy to pressure Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelenskyy into peace negotiations with Russia, while maintaining defensive intelligence support.

Title: Intelligence cutoff and Russian drone warfare push thousands of U...
Description: Ukraine's ambitious incursion into Russian territory, once seen as a strategic masterstroke, now teeters on collapse as Russian forces exploit intelligence gaps and overwhelming drone capabilities to divide Ukrainian positions.
